name: Riding in the 90s
description:
Load crates onto your car and drive them to the correct warehouse.

[WASD] to move
[Mouse] to move the camera
[F] to interact with junk
[Left mouse] to shoot in the car
[Shift] to boost when you can afford it
[P] to reset so you don't tryna reload

Sand worms refill your booster tank when killed.
Now, TAKE CARE man!

Made by:

TiredStudent15: https://twitter.com/TiredStudent15

Vederant: https://twitter.com/gszargot

Song: Devotion - Synth Kid
